Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Repeals the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax
Summary: Repeals the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax; requires the commissioner of taxation and finance to review and recommend to the governor, the temporary president of the senate, and the speaker of the assembly any other provisions of law which require amendments or repeal thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal article 23 of the tax law, in relation to the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax
